sentences.en: Gifford was a friend. I'd known him for nine years.
sentences.cn: 吉福德是我的一位朋友。我和他认识9年了。

sentences.en: Harry dismissed his old friend's speech as "a nine-day wonder"
sentences.cn: 哈里对老朋友的讲话不屑一顾，称之“火不了多久”。

sentences.en: He arrived with a police escort shortly before half past nine.
sentences.cn: 快到9点半的时候，他在一名警察的护送下到达了。

sentences.en: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.cn: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: I looked down the hallway to room number nine.
sentences.cn: 我顺着走廊看了一眼9号房。

sentences.en: I thought, naively, that this would be a nine-to-five job.
sentences.cn: 我天真地以为这是份朝九晚五的工作。

sentences.en: Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.cn: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

sentences.en: Members of parliament approved the move by a majority of ninety-nine.
sentences.cn: 议员以99张的多数票批准了这项动议.

sentences.en: More than 30 horses have been mutilated in the last nine months.
sentences.cn: 在过去9个月里，超过30匹马受了重伤。

sentences.en: More than nine hundred people have died in the fighting.
Nine months later, those talks appear as distant as ever.
sentences.cn: 9个月以后，那些会谈似乎仍然遥遥无期。

sentences.en: Ninety-nine per cent of primary pupils now have hands-on experience of computers.
sentences.cn: 现在，99%的小学生都亲手操作过电脑。

sentences.en: The map shows the rest of the western region, encompassing nine states.
sentences.cn: 地图上显示了西部地区的其他部分，包括9个州。

sentences.en: The nine crew on the Boeing 747 were released unharmed.
sentences.cn: 那架波音747上的9名机组成员平安获释。

sentences.en: The price of a single ticket is thirty-nine pounds.
We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
When Michael was born I was on cloud nine.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔出生的时候，我都乐得找不着北了。

phrases.tran_cn: n. [俚]九重天（想象中的天堂）；[俚]极乐心境；[俚]狂喜状态
[美口]全部；一切事物；从头至尾
